Iris Scanning: Iris scanning technology, which uses the unique patterns of the iris to identify individuals, can be used to prove identity.
Voice Recognition: Voice recognition technology can be used to identify an individual based on the unique characteristics of their voice.
DNA Testing: DNA testing can be used to identify an individual based on their unique genetic code.
Behavioral Biometrics: Behavioral biometrics, such as gait analysis or keystroke recognition, can be used to identify an individual based on their unique patterns of movement or typing.
Facial Recognition: While facial recognition technology is controversial, it can be used to identify an individual based on the unique features of their face.
